intro.body: Itâ€™s after 10 PM and Senior Constable Ash Bowden is on to an unusual job.

ashOne.title: Ash Bowden

ashTwo.title: Ash Bowden

introTwo.body: Witnesses to the incident have given the location of this shopping mall car park. Ash soon spots what heâ€™s looking for.

actions.text: Iâ€™m just waiting for a mate.

prison.title: Ash Bowden

You can't be doing burnouts here mate. You've smashed up ya car.
You're coming to the station with me.
